ChunkText: studying in the usa were glad you are considering pursuing your education in the us! there are many resources available to learn more about researching schools in the us, applying to schools, and applying for a student visa to come to the US to begin your studies!
ContextAfter: study in the states this US government website clearly and thoroughly explains the process from the very beginning, and has many resources and tools to help you feel confident with the process you can view this website in many different languages.
